Question: OSIM International Pte Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
OSIM International Pte Ltd

CES 2024 Product Highlight: Smart DIY Massage Chair

- Received CES Innovation Award
- Features IoT technology for customizable full-body massage experience
- Consists of uJolly 2 Smart back massager and uSqueez 2 Smart leg massager
- Offers up to 24 unique combinations of full-body massage programs
- Equipped with Enhanced Dual-Action V-Grip Technology and realistic reflexology massage techniques
